Experiment_description: The experiments conducted focus on developing baseline models for SPR sequence classification. Node de7d5e562a724908b941c46f48417b33 uses a Bi-GRU encoder with SimCLR-style contrastive loss, while nodes 51edb58f0eeb48b2adfce152111207f5, 9501006aac1447e78d54f88b6fb613be, and 7f9d2dee3be844c6824b1533be6549a0 use a bi-directional LSTM with supervised learning.
Significance: These experiments are significant as they establish reliable benchmarks for the SPR task, demonstrate the effectiveness of LSTM in achieving high accuracy, and explore the potential of contrastive learning methods. The insights gained can guide future explorations in model enhancements and optimizations.
Description: The methods involve using different neural architectures for SPR sequence classification. The Bi-GRU model with contrastive learning aims to learn meaningful representations through a SimCLR-style loss, while the LSTM models process integer-encoded symbolic tokens through an embedding layer and a softmax classifier, evaluated with weighted accuracy metrics. These experiments provide foundational insights and establish a benchmark for future improvements.

List_of_included_plots.description: The plot shows the progression of training loss, validation loss, and contrastive loss over 5 epochs.
List_of_included_plots.analysis: The decrease and stabilization of losses indicate effective initial learning, with contrastive loss suggesting quick representation learning by the Bi-GRU model.

List_of_included_plots.description: This plot shows the training and validation loss curves over six epochs.
List_of_included_plots.analysis: The rapid convergence to near-zero losses indicates strong learning efficiency and suggests the LSTM's effective adaptation to the task.

List_of_included_plots.description: The training and validation loss curves indicate rapid convergence of the model.
List_of_included_plots.analysis: The stabilization of losses at near-zero values suggests excellent generalization and minimal overfitting by the LSTM model.

List_of_included_plots.description: The weighted accuracy metrics (SWA, CWA, and HWA) all show a steady increase over the epochs.
List_of_included_plots.analysis: The near-perfect accuracy metrics indicate the LSTM model's strong generalization ability and performance across evaluation criteria.

Key_numerical_results.description: Final test accuracy of Bi-GRU model.
Key_numerical_results.analysis: Indicates progress but highlights the need for further optimization compared to LSTM models.

Key_numerical_results.description: Final validation accuracy metrics for LSTM model in node 51edb58f0eeb48b2adfce152111207f5.
Key_numerical_results.analysis: Demonstrates the LSTM model's ability to achieve high accuracy and generalization.

Key_numerical_results.description: Final validation accuracy metrics for LSTM model in node 9501006aac1447e78d54f88b6fb613be.
Key_numerical_results.analysis: Shows the LSTM model's capability to achieve perfect accuracy, reflecting its effective learning of the task.

Key_numerical_results.description: Final validation accuracy metrics for LSTM model in node 7f9d2dee3be844c6824b1533be6549a0.
Key_numerical_results.analysis: Indicates the LSTM model's consistent high performance across validation criteria.
